title: Widest diffraction pattern made by different beams

content.question: A beam of which of the following will produce the widest diffraction pattern (i.e., adjacent minima will be the farthest apart) if all the particles have the same speed and pass through the same slit?

choices.label: None of the above; particles do not exhibit diffraction.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
